title: Ebow Thriller SFX Pack
description: Send chills through their spine with 152 unique sounds of e-bow guitar thrillers and terrifying noises. Here are horrific sound effects to create a frightening atmosphere.
longDescription:
Send chills through their spine with 152 unique sounds of e-bow guitar thrillers and terrifying noises. Here are horrific sound effects to create a frightening atmosphere.


Create a dark and ominous atmosphere with creepy guitar ebow designed sound effects. Induce fear and uneasiness.


Stand out with your sci-fi, horror and thriller projects with 152 fresh sound effects. And the usual Vadi Sound craft and attention to detail!


These sounds are available in 16-bit/48kHz, designed delicately so that you have the right tone for your related projects and room for further sound manipulation with the flexible texture of the sounds.

Keywords

Ebow Guitar Game Gaming Video Film Haunted Eerie Drone Texture Sci-Fi Horror Thriller Fear Mysterious Dark Bright Otherworldly, Tension Suspense Trailer Cinematic
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 152

Number of Audio Cues: 152

Sample rate / bit rate: 16 Bit/ 48 Khz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
